attributes.action: False Advertising- ITV to rename show, as 'stars' are not actually from Ascot
attributes.additional_details: Ascot is a sought after area to live in and many people are concerned that the programme will destroy its positive reputation.
attributes.background: TV show 'Absolutely Ascot'  is a gross misrepresentation of a good area and many of its habitants are embarrassed by the recent advert broadcast on ITV.

rejection.details: You can find out how to complain directly to ITV here: http://www.itv.com/contactus
